org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils

Class JcrPropertyStatementListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.listeners.StatementListener
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils.JcrPropertyStatementListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.ModelChangedListener

    public class JcrPropertyStatementListener
extends com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.listeners.StatementListener
    Listen to Jena statement events, and when the statement is changed in the graph store, make the change within JCR as well.
    Author:
    awoods
